event.title: 2012 census the city had a population of 139,169 people, which accounted

data.event: In the 2012 census the city had a population of 139,169 people, which accounted for 91 percent of its municipality's total population of 152,806.
Founded in 1849, the city was renamed Ciudad Porfirio Díaz in 1888, in homage to President Porfirio Díaz.

event.title: was renamed Ciudad Porfirio Díaz in 1888

data.event: Founded in 1849, the city was renamed Ciudad Porfirio Díaz in 1888, in homage to President Porfirio Díaz.
This mine closed around 1905, after a fire.
